actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the use of an annual accrual method of accounting for the trade or business of farming bananas or pineapples.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the use of an annual accrual method of accounting for the trade or business of farming bananas or pineapples.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the use of an annual accrual method of accounting for the trade or business of farming bananas or pineapples.
